name: Third Space Creative
overview:
Third Space Creative is a women-owned small business specializing in web-based solutions to meet training and education challenges. We develop innovative programs that blend current technology and proven learning theory to meet our clientsâ€™ objectives. Our award-winning team has worked with educational institutions, government agencies, and non-profit organizations throughout the United States and around the world. We have experience with US Government contracts, including USAID, the Department of State, and the Department of Health and Human Services.

Subject Matter Expertise

We contribute recognized expertise in the following areas:

Human trafficking Gender equality Gender-based violence Civil society HIV/AIDS education and awareness English as a Second Language K-12 education Higher education
